text: Tyancyapurvi nuhacya janasamuhane ani tyancya nantaracya itara janasamuhanni dekhila khote tharavile hote ani pratyeka janasamudayane apalya paigambarala bandista banavinyaca irada kela ani asatyadva'are hatavadipana kela, yasathi ki tyadvare satyala nasta karuna takave, tevha mi tyanna pakadita ghetale, tara bagha kasi hoti majhi siksa
